wikipedia_page.main: William Black (5 September 1882 – 7 February 1960) was a Scottish footballer who played for Queen's Park, Celtic (winning the Scottish Football League title in his sole season with the club, 1904–05, but suffering a bad injury), Everton Dumbarton, Kilmarnock, Hamilton Academical and Airdrieonians. He was born on the Isle of Mull but spent most of his life living in Motherwell.
